The HTML will bring you back to this entry, so others may use it too. National Breast Cancer Foundation Fund free mammograms for underpriviledged women Early detection Contribute to the quest for the cure Queensland [Australia] Cancer Fund

I'm serious about this, so please, humor me and read this. kthx. [.001] If I know you, just comment with your name. If I'm confused about you and can't figure you out from your profile {you be the judge}, let me know how I know you. [.002] If I don't know you, that's cool too. Just let me know how you found me and what we have in common and I'll get back to you. [.003] Generally I'm pretty fast about online stuff, so if I've already added you, ignore your introductory comment. [.004] I like to bitch. Just thought I'd get that out there. [.005] I'd prefer it if you didn't reply with a "omg huh?"-type comment if I'm being cryptic. I like being cryptic, so deal with it. I also hate explaining things, call it a major pet peeve. Just take a look, I bet I've stated whatever's in question before, and quite possibly recently. Got all that? You sure? All right, have fun!
